author: Asha Verma
content: Dakshayani delivered a seamless 8 kW installation with remote monitoring that helped us cut bills by 78%.

author: Rakesh Sharma
content: Their team retrofitted our plant without disrupting production. Transparent reporting and GA4 dashboards impress.

author: Jaya Ekka
content: We now monitor our irrigation pumps from mobile. Subsidy paperwork and maintenance are handled end-to-end.
